report.title: Blurred PoMS results
report.description: All PomS results. Includes blurred location data. Note this will only work on BRC Live Warehouse as I had to include hard-coded survey IDs 636, 637, 638, 641
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_samples_functional s JOIN cache_samples_nonfunctional csnf on csnf.id = s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional cof on cof.sample_id = s.id LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_nonfunctional conf on conf.id = cof.id LEFT JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav on oav.occurrence_id = cof.id AND occurrence_attribute_id = #insect_abund_occ_id# AND oav.deleted = false #agreements_join# WHERE #sharing_filter# #idlist# AND s.survey_id in ( #public_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_fit_count_survey_id#,#1km_pan_traps_survey_id#,#fit_count_app_survey_id# ) AND ((trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR s.date_end >= CAST('#year#' || '-01-01' as date)) AND (trim('#year#') = '' OR '#year#'='Click here' OR s.date_start <= CAST('#year#' || '-12-31' as date))) AND (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='')

param.name: current_user_id
param.description: Current user's warehouse ID. Allows a column to be output indicating that the user owns the record.

param.name: habitat_smp_id
param.description: ID of sample attribute that holds the habitat.

param.name: target_smp_id
param.description: ID of sample attribute that holds the target flower.

param.name: insect_abund_occ_id
param.description: ID of occurrence attribute that holds abundances of the insects.

param.name: year
param.description: Select a year, or leave blank for all years

param.name: public_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the public fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_fit_count_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km fit count survey.

param.name: 1km_pan_traps_survey_id
param.description: ID of the 1km pan traps survey.

param.name: fit_count_app_survey_id
param.description: ID of the fit count app survey.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.lookup_values: 636:FIT Count,637:FIT Count 1km,638:1km pan traps,641:FIT Count App

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of sample IDs to filter to.

param.name: start_time_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the start time.

param.name: cover_within_patch_attr_id
param.display: Cover within patch sample attr ID
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the cover within patch.

param.name: flowers_counted_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the flowers counted.

param.name: flower_unit_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the flower unit.

param.name: patch_context_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the patch context.

param.name: cloud_cover_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the cloud cover.

param.name: wind_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the wind value.

param.name: patch_sunshine_attr_id
param.description: ID of the sample attribute that holds the patch sunshine.

param.name: bumblebee_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for bumblebee.

param.name: honeybee_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for Honeybee.

param.name: solitary_bee_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for solitary bee.

param.name: wasp_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for wasp.

param.name: hoverflies_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for hoverfly.

param.name: other_flies_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for other flies.

param.name: butterflies_moths_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for butterflies moths.

param.name: beetles_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for beetles.

param.name: small_insects_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for small insects.

param.name: other_insects_taxon_meaning_id
param.description: Meaning ID for other insects.

param.name: abundance_attr_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence attribute that holds abundance.

column.name: survey_title
column.sql: case s.survey_id when #public_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count' when #1km_fit_count_survey_id# then 'FIT Count 1km' when #1km_pan_traps_survey_id# then '1km pan traps' when #fit_count_app_survey_id# then 'FIT Count App' else '' END

column.name: habitat
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#habitat_smp_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: other_habitat
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#other_habitat_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: target
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#target_smp_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: start_time
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#start_time_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: pan_trap_number
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#trap_station_smp_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: bumblebees
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #bumblebee_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: honeybee
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #honeybee_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: solitary_bee
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #solitary_bee_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: wasp
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #wasp_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: hoverflies
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #hoverflies_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: other_flies
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #other_flies_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: butterflies_moths
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #butterflies_moths_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: beetles
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #beetles_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: small_insects
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #small_insects_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: other_insects
column.sql: count(case when cof.taxon_meaning_id = #other_insects_taxon_meaning_id# then (conf.attrs_json->>('#abundance_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#'))::integer else 0 end)

column.name: cover_within_patch_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#cover_within_patch_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: flowers_counted_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#flowers_counted_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: flower_unit_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#flower_unit_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: patch_context_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#patch_context_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: cloud_cover_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#cloud_cover_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: wind_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#wind_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: patch_sunshine_attr_id
column.sql: csnf.attrs_json->>('#patch_sunshine_attr_id#' || ':' || '#language#')

column.name: show_public_fit_count_edit_icon
column.display: Show public fit count edit icon
column.sql: CASE WHEN (CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#public_fit_count_survey_id#' OR CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#fit_count_app_survey_id#') AND CAST(s.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#current_user_id#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: show_1km_fit_count_edit_icon
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#1km_fit_count_survey_id#' AND CAST(s.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#current_user_id#' THEN true ELSE false END

column.name: show_1km_pan_traps_edit_icon
column.sql: CASE WHEN CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying) = '#1km_pan_traps_survey_id#' AND CAST(s.created_by_id AS character varying) = '#current_user_id#' THEN true ELSE false END
